Flexbox

This div is placed in a flexbox container width justify and align set to center.

Put .o-flex on any element to make it a flexbox container. All direct child elements are now flexbox children and will float left by default.

Item 1
Longer Item 2
Item 3

Use the extention classes to justify the children.
